data.name: Plague Inc.
data.description:
最新版本:  1.17.4
更新时间:  2020-02-27 01:34:57 (北京时间)

Mutation 17 - The Fake News update

From wild conspiracy theories to election campaign mudslinging, we now live in a post-fact world where falsehoods and misinformation can spread just like a disease.

With help from professional fact checking organisations like ‘Full Fact’ in the UK and ‘Politifact’ in the USA - we’ve designed a radically different scenario which lets you create your very own Fake News story and deceive the world with it.

Choose your type of misinformation, decide a motive and then select who started it and who gets the blame then use a variety of modern tools and psychological tricks to go viral!

Check out www.fullfact.org and www.politifact.com to find and expose bad information.

Hotfix 1.17.2 - Localised the Fake News government actions and fixed a few bugs
Hotfix 1.17.3 - Fixed pie chart image and rare crash in Portuguese
Hotfix 1.17.4 - Small core simulation tweaks

iOS 13, WatchOS 6.
Auto dark, light mode setting option.

6.3.1 - Small fix on the welcome screen for people that have native dark mode enabled. It changed the text to white on white. This made things somewhat hard to understand.

Now back to the huge HeartWatch update for December!

data.name: Geometry Dash
data.description:
最新版本:  2.11
更新时间:  2017-11-17 02:43:46 (北京时间)

Update 2.1.1 is here!

This update will function like a smaller "pre-update" before Update 2.2. Lots of fun stuff planned :)

- iPhone X support!
- New icons and effects!
- New community shop!
- Weekly Demon challenge!
- Folders and level sorting!
- New demon chests!
- Level leaderboards!
- Random other fun stuff.
- Lots of bugfixes and tweaks.

- There was an item duplication bug in version 2.1 that gave users extra rewards. This has been fixed in 2.11 and those rewards have been removed. So if you lose shards/diamonds etc after loading 2.11 its because they were bugged. Sorry :/

/RubRub

data.name: ACNH Travel Guide
data.description:
最新版本:  2020.6.3
更新时间:  2020-05-09 01:39:46 (北京时间)

Thank you all for sharing your ideas, suggestions, and feedback! This update brings several new features:

- Daily Tasks List
Never forget to talk to your favorite villager again and always be sure that you've found all 4 fossils. The list of tasks is fully customizable so it will always suit your own needs.

- More Info on Villagers
Villagers now list their favorite colors and styles, and you can quickly get a list of the best gifts for them.

- Added Emotions
Track the reactions that you've learned, and see which villagers can teach you the ones you're still missing. I hope this gives you... happiness!

There are several other smaller improvements to the app as well:
- Added a list of tools
- See all the DIY Recipes you can craft with a material
- Added style and Label theme of clothing items (2020.6.1)
- Quickly go from DIY recipe to its crafted (catalog) item, and the other way around
- Group furniture, clothing and wallpapers by source and by whether they are craftable
- Group bugs and fish by their availability in any specific month
- Reveal the English names of items by tapping on their name (for non-English languages)
- Sort villagers by birthday
- New languages options: Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Canadian French and American Spanish
- Make it possible to undo a task by tapping on it again (2020.6.2)
- Fully customize which villagers should appear in the daily tasks list (2020.6.3)
- Don't take diacritics into account when searching (2020.6.3)
- Heart toggle enabled by default for villagers (2020.6.3)
- Added a button on the Daily Tasks card to quickly add new tasks (2020.6.3)

If you like the app, please help spread the word by telling other AC players about it, or by leaving a rating in the App Store. Thanks!

Jeffrey

data.name: Juicy Realm
data.description:
最新版本:  3.0.4
更新时间:  2020-05-02 15:00:00 (北京时间)

Juicy Realm is a roguelike game with fruits as enemies. It is set in a world in which the line between animals and plants is blurred. It began with the tipping of the food-chain, which forced the humans to establish an outpost and begin an investigation in the region where the first species of mutated plants was discovered. The military has prepared a vast number of powerful weapons, with you leading the vanguard forces to wage this long war.

data.name: Rebel Inc.
data.description:
最新版本:  1.4.7
更新时间:  2020-03-24 19:29:33 (北京时间)

Rebel Inc. Update 4 - The Azure Dam expansion
New map: Azure Dam - Rebuild a vast dam to prevent catastrophic floods and ensure stability in this arid region. Protect vulnerable supply convoys en route to the dam site, but beware - Insurgents forces will launch aggressive raids to destroy them!

New Governor: Development Director - This skilled micromanager deploys civilian experts to prioritise zones for development and rapidly stabilise key parts of the region. High performance. Delivered...

All new civilian ‘concerns’ mechanic - Wondering how to best win hearts and minds? Now you can gather intel on zones to discover if civilians need specific initiatives. Strategise and stabilise on a whole new level!

Numerous balance tweaks, fixes and improvements including further AI enhancements.

As for the future, we’ve got a whole bunch more ideas for new maps, governors and more still to come. Let us know what you would most like to see!

James
1.4.1 - New content automatically unlocks if previously bought
1.4.2 - Fixed region zoom issue
1.4.3 - Tweaks to game balance on lower difficulties
1.4.5 - Fixed Warlord unlock bug, fixed Insurgent fleeing bug, improved Garrison placement AI
1.4.6 - Added Turkish language support
1.4.7 - Added Pashto and Dari language support

data.name: LumaFusion
data.description:
最新版本:  2.2.3
更新时间:  2020-04-01 04:45:20 (北京时间)

IMPROVED:
• Export popover shows current fps for export (fps must be changed in Help/Settings)
• Changing fps for project will duplicate your project unless the project is empty

FIXED:
• Audio filters sometimes stop processing, especially in 59.94 fps projects
• Crash could occur when using FCPXML export with some .wav files
• Issues with filters on multi-track audio files. Also added warning for surround-sound audio tracks that will not work with audio filters.
• Keyboard shortcuts for clip editor and select clip on Korean keyboards
• Fixed crash that could occur when browsing external drives
• Fixed thumbnail generation hang that could occur when browsing external drives

In upcoming releases we will continue adding new features, and will continue to enhance every aspect of LumaFusion. Find tutorials, reference-guide, answers to your questions, and contact us directly at https://luma-touch.com/support

data.name: My Macros+ | Diet & Calories
data.description:
最新版本:  2020.15
更新时间:  2020-05-07 00:49:06 (北京时间)

Thank you very much for your continued support! We're here with another great update.

In this update we vastly improved external keyboard and trackpad support on iOS 13.4.
• Hold the cmd key on your iPads keyboard to see all the quick actions you can perform without your hands leaving the keys

We also added some nice features to the left side menu. Now you can:
• Reorder the food categories to whatever order you want
• Add new, smart menu categories to track food even faster if you are a Pro user

Also, squashed some bugs around login, adding custom foods and tracking water in the main page pop up

- Support adding videos via the camera and photo library.
- Added '*' keyboard shortcut to mark current note in study screen.
- Fixed an issue burying notes with the V1 scheduler.
- Fixed a bug that was causing added tags to not appear when searching.
- If you were affected by either of the above two issues, please use the Check Database option in the preferences screen to fix any problems.
- Various other bugfixes.
